issues.description: The template repository defines a constructor for the Lecture class with only three parameters (String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents), while the problem statement and UML diagram specify that it should include five parameters to initialize all attributes (String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors). This discrepancy could confuse students, as they might attempt to implement the constructor based on the template's incomplete signature, preventing them from matching the intended design in the solution and problem statement.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the constructor signature in the template repository to match the problem statement and UML diagram by changing it to: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) { // TODO: Complete constructor implementation }
